LiveAgentSession.name: LiveAgentSession
LiveAgentSession.description: This object is automatically created for each Chat session and stores information about the session.

AgentId.description: ID of the agent associated with the session.

ChatReqAssigned.description: The number of chat requests that were assigned to an agent during a session.

ChatReqDeclined.description: The number of chat requests that were declined by an agent during a session.

ChatReqEngaged.description: The number of chats in which an agent was engaged during a session.

ChatReqTimedOut.description: The number of chat requests that timed out in an agent’s queue during a session.

LastReferencedDate.description: The date and time that the session record was last referenced.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time that the session record was last viewed.

LoginTime.description: The date and time an agent logged in during the session.

LogoutTime.description: The date and time an agent logged out during a session.

NumFlagLoweredAgent.description: The number of assistance flags lowered by the agent.

NumFlagLoweredSupervisor.description: The number of assistance flags lowered by the supervisor.

NumFlagRaised.description: The number of assistance flags raised by the agent.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of the session record.

TimeAtCapacity.description: The amount of time an agent spent with the maximum number of chats in his or her queue.

TimeIdle.description: The amount of time an agent spent idle during the session.

TimeInAwayStatus.description: The amount of time an agent spent with a status of “Away” during a session.

TimeInChats.description: The amount of time an agent spent engaged in chats during a session.

TimeInOnlineStatus.description: The amount of time an agent spent with a status of “Online” during a session.
